body_content.explanation: in a sports team, especially in baseball, the practice of using two players at different times at the same position:
examples: North Carolina began the platooning of the two quarterbacks on a set rotation.

body_content.explanation: a method of connecting vehicles either physically or using computer technology so they can travel close together in a group, as a way of saving space, fuel, or money:
examples: We will encourage cooperative vehicle systems, including platooning.
